name: Bolt Action Rifle
description: The Bolt Action Rifle is the first long-range Firearm that prospectors can create. It can utilize the 7.62mm Round , the Incendiary Rifle Round , etc. Along with the Shotgun , it provides Prospectors with a significant increase in survivability when encountering the Fauna of Icarus. The Bolt Action Rifle can fire 75 rounds before breaking, and the talent Gunsmith can increase this to up to a maximum of 90 rounds, so bring a Machining Bench for long trips.
